description: For leads from companies showing buying intent for sentiment analysis, reviews, reputation monitoring

emails.subject: Saw {{company_name}} is researching sentiment analysis
emails.preview: We might be exactly what you're looking for
emails.body_text:
Hi {{first_name}},

I noticed {{company_name}} has been researching sentiment analysis and review monitoring solutions.

That's exactly what we do - but built specifically for institutional investors.

ReviewSignal analyzes millions of consumer reviews across 500k+ locations to generate trading signals. We track sentiment shifts for restaurants, retail, and hospitality brands - the kind of data that correlates with same-store sales before it shows up in financials.

Since you're actively evaluating options, I thought I'd reach out directly.

Would it help to see:
1. A demo of our platform?
2. Sample data and methodology docs?
3. Our 6-month track record?

Happy to share any or all of the above.

Simon
Founder, ReviewSignal.ai

emails.subject: Quick overview - since you're evaluating sentiment tools
emails.preview: How we compare to general-purpose tools
emails.body_text:
{{first_name}},

Since {{company_name}} is looking at sentiment analysis options, here's how we differ from general-purpose tools:

GENERAL SENTIMENT TOOLS (Brandwatch, Sprinklr, etc.)
• Built for marketing teams
• Focus on social media mentions
• Real-time dashboards for brand monitoring
• No investment signals

REVIEWSIGNAL
• Built for quant funds and PMs
• Focus on consumer reviews (leading indicator)
• Location-level granularity (500k+ sites)
• Generates actionable trading signals
• API/data feed for model integration
• 6-month track record with 67% accuracy

We're not a marketing tool - we're alternative data infrastructure for investment decisions.

If that aligns with what you're looking for, let's talk.

Simon

emails.subject: Still evaluating sentiment tools?
emails.preview: Happy to help when timing is right
emails.body_text:
Hi {{first_name}},

I've reached out a few times since I saw {{company_name}} was researching sentiment analysis solutions.

A few possibilities:

a) You found what you needed (congrats!)
b) Still evaluating but swamped
c) Not the right fit

If (b), I'm happy to wait and follow up when timing is better. Just let me know.

If (c), I'd genuinely appreciate knowing what you're looking for that we don't offer - helps us improve.

Either way, I'll stop the emails for now. Feel free to reach out anytime if things change.

Best of luck with the evaluation.

Simon
ReviewSignal.ai

P.S. Our pilot program ($2,500/month) remains open if you want to test with real capital allocation decisions.
